title: Morristown National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Facilities Washington's Headquarters Museum  Address: 30 Washington Place, Morristown, NJ 07960 Phone Number: 973-539-2016 ext.210 Hours: 9:30 a.m. to 5 p.m., Wednesday through Sunday. Closed Monday and Tuesday as well as Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day. Summer Hours (July 1-August 31): Open daily from 9:30 am to 5:00 pm. Please note that the museum will be closed on the following dates and times: - Friday, August 12 from 9:30 am to 10:00 am Ford Mansion Address: 30 Washington Place, Morristown, NJ 07960 Phone Number: 973-539-2016 ext.210 Tour Times: 10am, 11am, 1pm, 2pm, 3pm and 4pm, Wednesday through Sunday. Closed Monday and Tuesday.  Summer Tour Hours (July 1-August 31): Daily at 10am, 11am, 1pm, 2pm, 3pm and 4pm  Tours are limited to 20 visitors per tour. You can purchase tickets at Washington's Headquarters Museum. All tickets are first come first served, no reservations. Closed on Monday and Tuesday as well as Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day. Please note that there will be no Ford Mansion tours on the following dates and times: - Friday, August 12 at 10:00 am Jockey Hollow Visitor Center Address: 580 Tempe Wick Road, Morristown, NJ 07960 (approximately) Phone Number: 973-543-4030 Hours: 9:30 a.m. to 5 p.m., Wednesday through Sunday. Closed Monday and Tuesday as well as Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day  Summer Hours (July 1-August 31): Open daily from 9:30 am to 5:00 pm Please note that the visitor center will be closed on the following dates and times:    - Friday, August 12 from 9:30 am to 11:00 am   Note: Scheduled education programs will NOT be affected by these closures. Wick House Address: 580 Tempe Wick Road, Morristown, NJ 07960 (approximately) Phone Number: 973-543-4030 Hours: 9:30 am to noon & 1:00 pm to 4:00 pm Wednesday through Sunday. Closed Monday and Tuesday as well as on Thanksgiving, December 25, and January 1. Summer Hours (July 1-August 31): As scheduling permits. Call 973-543-4030 in advance to check. Please note that the Wick House will be closed on the following dates and times: - Friday, August 12 from 9:30 am to 11:00 am      Â     Grounds Jockey Hollow Encampment Area Address: 580 Tempe Wick Road, Morristown, NJ 07960 (approximately) Hours:   April 10, 2016 to September 3, 2016: 8 am to 8 pm September 4, 2016 to October 8, 2016: 8 am to 7 pm October 9, 2016 to November 5, 2016: 8 am to 6 pm November 6, 2016 to February 11, 2017: 8 am to 5 pm  New Jersey Brigade and Cross Estate Gardens Area Address: 61 Jockey Hollow Road, Bernardsville, NJ 07924 Hours:   April 10, 2016 to September 3, 2016: 8 am to 8 pm  September 4, 2016 to October 8, 2016: 8 am to 7 pm  October 9, 2016 to November 5, 2016: 8 am to 6 pm  November 6, 2016 to February 11, 2017: 8 am to 5 pm   Fort Nonsense Area Adress: 16 Chestnut Street, Morristown, NJ 07960 Hours:   April 10, 2016 to September 3, 2016: 8 am to 8 pm  September 4, 2016 to October 8, 2016: 8 am to 7 pm  October 9, 2016 to November 5, 2016: 8 am to 6 pm  November 6, 2016 to February 11, 2017: 8 am to 5 pm
